channel.title: fallafel on An Attempt to Organise my Mind

item.title: Falafel
item.description: Ingredients 1 (15-ounce) can chickpeas, rinsed and drained 1 cup fresh parsley leaves, tightly-packed 1 cup fresh cilantro leaves, tightly-packed 1⁄2 cup diced red or yellow onion 1⁄3 cup flour (such as all-purpose, white whole wheat, chickpea, or a 1:1 gluten-free flour) 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice 1 1⁄2 teaspoons baking powder 1 1⁄2 teaspoons ground cumin 1 teaspoon fine sea salt 1⁄2 teaspoon black pepper 6 small garlic cloves, peeled and roughly chopped 4–6 tablespoons high-heat oil (such as avocado oil, grapeseed oil or vegetable oil) for serving: pita bread, chopped lettuce, sliced red onions, sliced tomatoes, tzatziki sauce, tahini sauce and/or hummus Method Roughly purée your ingredients.
